attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As soon as a women draws her state pension,she can not claim carers allowance,giving someone care and 24/7 care,they should be payed,even if it is minuim wage,and tax free.Private pensions should not stop people getting benifits,as little as they are worth.
You should be sorting this,it wont go away as long as there are caring people living.If I was getting payed,£6 an hour,I would be earning £580 a week,thats not including sleeping over every night.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
